name: Customer_Journey_Map_for_NPS_Stage_Analysis_Beta1_tp
label: Customer Journey Map for NPS - Stage Analysis - Beta

Responsive_customer__1.label: Responsive customer Vs Customer Base

Participant_Responsi_1.label: Participant Responsiveness
Participant_Responsi_1.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.SurveyQuestionResponsewithDetails18_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'Question_QuestionType' == "NPS"; q = group q by 'Invitation_Participant_Name'; q = foreach q generate 'Invitation_Participant_Name' as 'Invitation_Participant_Name', count() as 'Responses', {{cell(Max_Min_Toggle_1.selection,0,"Text2").asObject()}}('NumberValue') as 'NumberValue'; q = order q by 'NumberValue' {{cell(Max_Min_Toggle_1.selection,0,"Sort_type").asObject()}}; q = limit q 2000;

Response_Details_1.label: Response Details

Responses_by_stage_1.label: Responses by stage
